text:
:books: SKI-ML Lab NLP Seminar :books:

안녕하세요, 이재윤 교수님 연구실 (Structure and Knowledge Injection into ML Lab) 에서
학기중 자연어처리 및 Structure & Knowledge Injection 주제로 Weekly *논문 세미나*를 개최합니다.
(매주 수 오후 5-7시, 942동 회의실)

> *세미나에 대한 소식과 calendar invitation을 받아보고 싶으신 분은* 
> *<https://forms.gle/6YdtLRgLT9GU92MD7|Google Form>으로 sign-up 해주시면 이메일 리스트에 추가하겠습니다.*
아울러, *내일* 첫 세미나가 있을 예정입니다.
음식과 장소 관계로 총 *10분 정도 선착순* 참석자를 모집하오니
참석을 원하시는 경우 위 Signup Form 작성 부탁드립니다~! :relaxed:

> • 일시: 내일 (3/8) 저녁 5-7시
> • 장소: 942동 308호
> • 주제(발표논문):
>     ◦ <https://aclanthology.org/2022.acl-long.177/|ExtEnD: Extractive Entity Disambiguation (E. Barba et al. 2022 ACL)>
>     ◦ <https://papers.nips.cc/paper/2019/hash/2c601ad9d2ff9bc8b282670cdd54f69f-Abstract.html|Are Sixteen Heads Really Better than One? (P. Michel et al., 2019 NIPS)>
> • 발표자: 3기 송종현 (<mailto:hyeongoon11@snu.ac.kr|hyeongoon11@snu.ac.kr>)
> • Sign-up form: *<https://forms.gle/6YdtLRgLT9GU92MD7|Google Form>*
감사합니다!

--

Hello, we are the SKI-ML Lab (Structure and Knowledge Injection into ML) led by Professor Jay-yoon Lee.
We will be hosting a weekly offline paper reading seminar on NLP and the injection of structure and knowledge into ML models.
(Wednesdays 5-7PM at a conference room located in building 942)

> *If you are interested in receiving weekly event information and invitations for the seminar,* 
> *please sign up via <https://forms.gle/6YdtLRgLT9GU92MD7|Google Form>, and we will add you to our email list.*
Moreover, there will be our first seminar *tomorrow* (more details below).
If you would like to attend, please also write the signup form.
Due to limited seats and refreshments, we will accommodate the *first 10 individuals* who register. :relaxed:

> • Date/Time: Tomorrow (3/8) 5-7PM
> • Location: Building 942 Room 308
> • Topics(papers):
>     ◦ <https://aclanthology.org/2022.acl-long.177/|ExtEnD: Extractive Entity Disambiguation (E. Barba et al. 2022 ACL)>
>     ◦ <https://papers.nips.cc/paper/2019/hash/2c601ad9d2ff9bc8b282670cdd54f69f-Abstract.html|Are Sixteen Heads Really Better than One? (P. Michel et al., 2019 NIPS)>
> • Speaker: Jong Song (<mailto:hyeongoon11@snu.ac.kr|hyeongoon11@snu.ac.kr>)
> • Sign-up form: *<https://forms.gle/6YdtLRgLT9GU92MD7|Google Form>*
Thank you!

attachments.title: Google Forms: Sign-in
attachments.text: Access Google Forms with a personal Google account or Google Workspace account (for business use).
